DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether maternal bone resorption would be seen in Hyperemesis Gravidarum and could be detected in early period using serum vitamin D levels, serum calcium (Ca) levels, serum parathormone (PTH) levels and urine N- telopeptide levels in the patients with Hyperemesis Gravidarum.
